text.Prompt: Can you tell me how to deal with an ex boyfriend who wants more space?
text.Response A: It's important to respect your ex boyfriend's wishes and give him the space he needs. Try to focus on your own happiness and well-being during this time. You may want to consider seeking support from friends and family members, or pursuing new hobbies or interests to keep yourself busy. It's also important to take time to reflect and process your feelings before jumping into a new relationship.
text.Response B: Well, I’m not sure that I understand what you mean by “more space”.  Do you mean he wants to have more space in his life, or in your life?  Do you mean that he wants more time with you, or with you more often?  Do you mean that he wants to have a different kind of relationship with you, or with you more intensely?  Or something else?

976.displayed_text:
Prompt

Can you tell me how to deal with an ex boyfriend who wants more space?

Response A

It's important to respect your ex boyfriend's wishes and give him the space he needs. Try to focus on your own happiness and well-being during this time. You may want to consider seeking support from friends and family members, or pursuing new hobbies or interests to keep yourself busy. It's also important to take time to reflect and process your feelings before jumping into a new relationship.

Response B

Well, I’m not sure that I understand what you mean by “more space”. Do you mean he wants to have more space in his life, or in your life? Do you mean that he wants more time with you, or with you more often? Do you mean that he wants to have a different kind of relationship with you, or with you more intensely? Or something else?
